```{r}
# Henter inn flights pÃ¥ ny
flights <- nycflights13::flights
```

```{r}
flights <- flights |>
  select(-year) |> 
  select(
    month:day, 
    flyselskap = carrier, 
    halenummer = tailnum, 
    everything()
    ) |> 
  # setter tilbake til engelsk variabelnavn vha. rename()
  rename(
    carrier = flyselskap,
    tailnum = halenummer
  )
```

```{r}
arr_delay_May <- flights |> 
  select(day, month, arr_delay) |> 
  filter(month == 5) |>
  select(-month)
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
# Gjennomsnittlig ankomstforsikelse for dagene i Mai 2013
flights |> 
  filter(month == 5) |>
  group_by(day) |> 
  summarise(gjensnitt_f = round(
    mean(
    arr_delay, 
    na.rm = TRUE
    ), 
    digits = 2
  ),
  median_f = median(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE),
  min_f = min(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE),  
  maks_f = max(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE),
  total_f = sum(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) |> 
  print(n = 31)
```

```{r}
flights <- flights %>%
  select(month:day, ends_with("delay"), distance, air_time) %>%
  mutate(
    gain = dep_delay - arr_delay,
    speed = (distance/air_time) * 60
    ) %>%
  select(month:day, gain, everything()) %>%
  arrange(gain)
head(flights, n = 5) 
```

```{r}
my_data <- flights %>%
    transmute(
    gain = dep_delay - arr_delay,
    speed = (distance/air_time) * 60
    ) %>%
  arrange(gain)
head(my_data, n = 3)
```

```{r}
alt_my_data <- flights %>%
    mutate(
    gain = dep_delay - arr_delay,
    speed = (distance/air_time) * 60
    ) %>%
  select(gain, speed) |> 
  arrange(gain)
head(alt_my_data, n = 3)
```
